name: Canary Technologies
headline: Modernizing the hospitality tech stack.
description: We bring paper based workflows in hospitality online.  Canary's solutions are trusted by hotels worldwide, including Ace Hotel Group, Four Season, Wyndham Hotels, Classic Hotels, and others. We are going to eat all of hospitality software.

founders.name: Harman Narula, Founder
founders.description: Harman is Co-Founder & CEO at Canary Technologies, a venture backed hospitality technology company. Prior to Canary, Harman was a management consultant at Bain & Company, where he focused on private equity, technology, and hospitality. Previous to Bain, Harman was a part of the Global Strategy Group at Starwood Hotels (brands include Westin, Sheraton, W, & Others) &  worked in principal M&A at Citigroup. Harman holds an M.B.A. from The Wharton School, at UPENN and a B.S. from Cornell University.

generated_description:
Canary Technologies is a forward-thinking company based in San Francisco that has been on a mission since its founding in 2017 to modernize the hospitality tech stack. Initially, they set out to take the clunky, paper-based workflows of hoteliers and bring them into the digital realm. The transition from analog to digital was more than just a shift—it was a necessary evolution in an industry that was ripe for change.

Part of Y Combinator's S18 batch, Canary has gained the trust of notable hotel groups around the world, including Ace Hotel Group, Four Seasons, Wyndham Hotels, and Classic Hotels. Their ambition is clear: they're not just playing around the edges; they’re serious about “eating all of hospitality software.” 

The company's team has grown to about 150 employees, spearheaded by Group Partner Gustaf Alstromer. With a focus on creating a seamless experience for guests and operators alike, Canary’s solutions are designed to streamline operations and enhance guest satisfaction. They offer a range of products including a Guest Management System, mobile check-in, guest messaging, digital tipping, AI-driven guest interactions, and much more. 

Their recent announcement of an end-to-end AI voice platform stands testament to their innovative spirit, showing their commitment to leveraging technology to enhance the hospitality experience.

For hoteliers, Canary Technologies is more than just a software provider; they're a partner in revolutionizing how they interact with guests, manage operations, and ultimately, boost revenue and guest satisfaction. Their solutions are tailored to meet the unique needs of various hotel types, from independent hotels to large franchises.

In a nutshell, if you're in the hospitality industry and looking to modernize, streamline operations, and impress your guests—all while digging deep into the tech stack to ensure efficiency—Canary Technologies might just be the game-changing partner you need.

For more information, you can explore their offerings on their [website](https://www.canarytechnologies.com).
